Lista de Users

Nombre Apellido Email
{{user.nombre}} {{user.apellido}} {{user.email}}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { User } from '../user'; import { UserService } from '../user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-listar-user', templateUrl: './listar-user.component.html', styleUrls: ['./listar-user.component.css'] }) export class ListarUserComponent implements OnInit { users:User[]; constructor(private userService:UserService,private router: Router){} ngOnInit(): void { this.obtenerUser(); } actualizarUser(id:number){ this.router.navigate(['actualizar-empleado',id]); } private obtenerUser(){ this.userService.obtenerListadeUsuario().subscribe(dato=>{ this.users=dato; }); } }
